about.title: AI-Plus Strategy
about.description: Open Libra is a sovereign, on-chain investment endowment designed to survive and thrive across centuries.
about.mission: Our thesis is built on a foundational premise: all long-term institutions must correctly navigate the disruption AI will bring to every market.

aboutHighlights.title: Century-Scale Time Horizon
aboutHighlights.description: Designed for perpetual existence, Open Libra's structure enables capital and mission to compound uninterrupted over 100+ years.

aboutHighlights.title: All Weather, All Opportunity
aboutHighlights.description: Every asset class is under consideration. Having a broad portfolio mandate or a narrow AI mandate are equivalent, since AI will disrupt everything.

aboutHighlights.title: The Rails of Perpetual Capital
aboutHighlights.description: A fund with a 100+ year mandate requires an execution layer immune to jurisdictional drift, key-man risk, and institutional fragility — only a dedicated blockchain can provide that level of neutrality and permanence.

foundation.title: Main street common sense
foundation.description: Blockchain is not magical, it's table-stakes for independent capital. Capital must compound with rigor, transparency, and alignment to endure.

foundation.title: Independent & Unstoppable
foundation.description: Blockchain Built on decentralized infrastructure, Open Libra operates beyond agency, jurisdictional, and custodial risks, providing an unforgeable record of capital. Investment DAOs are the endgame of blockchain.

foundation.title: A battle-tested open funding model
foundation.description: Capital is allocated through specialized sub-DAOs, enabling parallel innovation, risk containment, and governance specialization.

strategy.title: Blockchain as institutional vehicle
strategy.description: aligns rapid investment with immutable, programmable covenants — ensuring a resilient, purpose-driven legacy beyond typical timelines.

governance.title: Governance in service of perpetuity
governance.description: Open Libra employs a layered governance model combining decentralized sub-DAOs, AI-assisted decision support, and immutable on-chain voting to ensure durability, adaptability, and stakeholder alignment over generations.

documentation.title: A proud history of transparency
documentation.description: We play a long and open game. Which means reacting and growing stronger though consensus. We document everything, and share it all publicly.

example.title: Example: A Sub-DAO in Action
example.description: Here's an example of a sub-DAO that could be launched on the Open Libra platform.

sections.title: Matching Funds for Sub-DAOs
sections.body: A research group creates an AI Drug Discovery Sub-DAO. Your platform provides matching funds to incentivize early donors. The more support the sub-DAO gets, the more global matching it receives.

sections.title: Open Creation & Community Wallets
sections.body: Any team can launch a new health-focused AI Sub-DAO (e.g., rare disease diagnostics, medical imaging models). Each has its own Community Wallet where backers can contribute. Builders, researchers, and donors collaborate in a transparent, decentralized way.

sections.title: Disbursements Controlled by Global and Donor policy
sections.body: Funding proposals (e.g., 'Train AI models on open genomics datasets') are submitted. Disbursements are approved by both global governance (DAO token holders) and direct contributors (donors to that sub-DAO), ensuring funds are spent on high-impact, aligned projects.

example.summary: This model enables the open creation of specialized investment funds, where spending decisions are governed by both global and local stakeholders, ensuring alignment and impact.

cta.title: Pro-social by constitution
cta.description: The most funded endowments in Open Libra have been created for philanthropic purposes. Our goal is to enable these DAOs to become among the world's largest public endowments.
